Package jol.core

This package contains the core system files.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Driver.Task Tasks are used to inject tuples into the schedule.
Runtime.Callback<T>  
Runtime.ResourceLoader Maps from resource filename to URL.
System The interface to the System.
 

Class Summary
Clock The system clock.
Driver The main driver loop that executes query objects Query.
Driver.Evaluator Table function represents the query processor that evaluates tuples using the query objects install by the runtime programs.
Driver.Flusher A table function that flushes TupleSet objects to the respective tables.
Log A table that stores log entries.
Runtime The system runtime.
Schedule Stores the set of tuples that are waiting to be inserted/deleted from the table store.
 

Enum Summary
Clock.Field An enumeration of all clock table fields.
Driver.Evaluator.Field The fields expected by this table function.
Driver.Flusher.Field The attribute fields expected by this table function.
Log.Field  
Log.Type  
Schedule.Field The field names of each attribute.
 

Package jol.core Description

This package contains the core system files. The system runtime is defined in Runtime.java, which contains system bootstrap and shutdown routines. The client interface to the system is defined in System.java.
